attributes.action: Abolish the use of the (Independent) Pay Review Body
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Independent pay review body is set up to independently decide on pay increases for the Police/Prison staff etc (public sector).
However when the independent pay review body submit their recommendations the government decide to implement what they think fit and ignore or partially implement the recommendations which should be 100% adhered to.
The pay review body should be abolished with immmediate effect because the Government are abusing the system and as such the pay review body cannot be seen to be Independent or fair.
